features.title: Key Features of GroupDocs.Merger for Node.js
features.description: Effortlessly merge, split, and manage documents in PDF and Office formats with GroupDocs.Merger in a Node.js environment.

feature_1.title: Seamless document combination
feature_1.content: Combine multiple documents into a single file by selecting specific pages or ranges from different sources using GroupDocs.Merger for Node.js.

feature_2.title: Document splitting capabilities
feature_2.content: Divide a large document into smaller, more manageable files with the advanced splitting tools provided by GroupDocs.Merger for Node.js.

feature_3.title: Efficient page movement
feature_3.content: Rearrange pages within a document to meet your needs using the MovePage feature, designed for seamless integration in Node.js.

feature_4.title: Page removal options
feature_4.content: Eliminate unwanted pages or specific page numbers effortlessly with the RemovePages feature in GroupDocs.Merger for Node.js.

feature_5.title: Page rotation functionality
feature_5.content: Adjust the orientation of pages to 90, 180, or 270 degrees with the simple and effective RotatePages operation.

feature_6.title: Page swapping feature
feature_6.content: Reorganize your document by swapping the positions of pages using the SwapPages function in GroupDocs.Merger for Node.js.

feature_7.title: Selective page extraction
feature_7.content: Extract specific pages or ranges to create a new document, focusing only on the content you need with GroupDocs.Merger for Node.js.

feature_8.title: Orientation alteration tool
feature_8.content: Switch the orientation of pages from portrait to landscape or vice versa using the ChangeOrientation feature in your Node.js applications.

feature_9.title: Document page previews
feature_9.content: Generate image previews of document pages to review their content and layout with the PreviewPages feature in Node.js.
